name: Guy Kawasaki
background: Born 1954 in Honolulu, HI. Stanford BA Psychology (1976), UCLA MBA (1977). Apple Macintosh evangelist (1983-87), Apple Fellow (1995). Founded ACIUS, Fog City Software; VC at Garage Technology Ventures. Chief Evangelist at Canva (2014-present). Authored 15 books including The Art of the Start (2004/2.0 2015), Enchantment (2011), Selling the Dream (1992), Wise Guy (2019). Pioneered 'evangelism marketing'.
